title: LF Bronze/Silver rank
body: 5 out of 9 games I had AFK/trolls. Check my KDA, I need help to get out of Bronze

replies.body: Add me man I also want to climb out plus I also main Top (But can play jg well) so we can help each other out with top lane matchups and strats etc..
if you need help to get out, you don't deserve to get out.

You play a lot of top lane, which is my second best role.
And holy shit those games are really long.

From the first thing I can see, you build the wrong items first.
(The items you get are good, its very nice to see someone buying banshies and Thornmail when need be)

I would also recommend getting some CDR runes, like 10%
This way you don't have to buy a CDR item at the start of the game.
(Excluding sheen as Triforce is amazing)
so you will reach 40% CDR quicker with fewer items.

Also I would like to point out that the average CS is 80 every 10 Mins.
And your the first bronze I've seen on this board ask for help that's actually done really well in that.
(Well better then everyone I've seen on bronze)

You've upgraded your trinket too, which im hoping you do at the 20 min mark.
I dont know if you actually use them tho or buy pinks.

like holy crap I cant really spot major bad things that stick out, normally this is easier for me.
I would suggest you recording your own games and re-watching them.
To actually pinpoint what your doing wrong.

(Kinda like this except its me helping out other bronze summoners)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

Your probably are doing something wrong if your in bronze, maybe not focusing getting objectives. Working with your team.
try a better champion or build different items
